creators.affiliation: Institute for Marine and Atmospheric research (IMAU), Department of Physics, Faculty of Science, Utrecht University & Space Accountants
creators.name: Altena, Bas

description: dhdt is a modular geodetic imaging framework written in Python. It uses data from imaging satellites to extract (above) surface kinematics and elevation (change). This is done via image matching techniques and geometric principles.
title: dhdt: A photohypsometric Python library to estimate glacier elevation change via optical remote sensing imagery
